children.value: B58 Finance

about.body.value: is a decentralized finance multi-feature wallet built on top of Cardano Blockchain. That provides the operational financial system infrastructure to our services.
This allows us to build features that empower you to be your own bank, using Peer-to-Peer communication with no need for middle agents.
We aim to bring the next generation of wallets to you and provide the same experience available today. By using traditional mobile banks and remove the complexity of the blockchain world.

about.title.value: About B58 Finance be powered by Cardano

children.value: DeFi

defi.body.value: (Decentralized Finance) services empower you to engage with others in the community, by providing liquidity to collateralized loans while you earn yields on your crypto assets.
You can also promote an open world where you can use our

children.value: Mission Transparency

defi.body.value: feature to Donate and register it on the blockchain.
Plus help small business take off their ideas or farmers in remote locations that need a micro-loan to grow their production. All of it using our

children.value: Social Lending

defi.body.value: based on our Social Proof algorithm.

defi.title.value: All you can do with Decentralized finance

home.body.value: The easiest way of being part of a decentralized financial world. Where everyone is welcome on B58 DeFi Wallet on Cardano, that you are in control of your finances.
Get access to global payments where transactions are borderless and low fees using it with friends and family or your business.
Build up your wealth by earning rewards on your savings. At the same time, you're free to use your balance whenever you need.

home.title.value: Be part of an open, secure and global financial world

page.description.value: The easiest way of being part of a decentralized financial world. Where everyone is welcome on B58 DeFi Wallet on Cardano, that you are in control of your finances.

page.title.value: B58 Finance - Multi Feature DeFi Wallet on Cardano

roadmap.body.value: Here you can find our roadmap of work in progress and also planned work.
Our phases are inspired by pioneers of computer science, which without their work it wouldn't be possible today.

roadmap.body.bl.description.value: The Borrowing/Lending feature is using the collateralised standard already in place in the crypto market.

children.value: As A Lender users can provide liquidity to contract pools, which will earn yields from the borrowing rate.
As a Borrowing users can put a collateral asset and get another paying an interest rate over it.

roadmap.body.bs.description.value: We're going to develop a liquidity system to provide the feature of buy/sell ADA with Fiat currency.

children.value: Will also Evaluate liquidity providers available in market.

roadmap.body.dc.description.value: The Debit Card, will provide the pay with crypto feature to users.

children.value: Users can get Debit cards with automatic conversion between Fiat/Crypto when using the card.
This feature will be provided via partnership with third party providers available in the market.

roadmap.body.frege.value: Pioneer of Computer Science by Extending Aristotelian logic with first-order predicate calculus.

roadmap.body.holberton.value: Pioneer of Computer Science by writing the first mainframe sort merge on the Univac.

roadmap.body.lovelace.value: Pioneer of Computer Science by writing the first algorithm to be execute in a computer.

roadmap.body.martin.value: Pioneer of Computer Science by developing the philosophical foundations of type theory.

roadmap.body.mt.description.value: The Mission Transparency, is a feature focused on our Community Mission Driven Stake pools that will provide visibility to their Donations.

children.value: Using Cardano’s Metadata Transaction we are going provide an immutable and trackable record of their Donations.
We also can support the payment of theses Donation through our wallet making partnership with the NGOs.

roadmap.body.network.description.value: Development our first Mainnet version, which will provide the APIs the backend features.

roadmap.body.sl.description.value: The Social lending feature that will fund Small Business through a Micro Lending Loan within a limit to be defined.

children.value: Users “Small Business” will be able to pitch their needs, and seek for fund through it.
Each Lender will be able to have one active lending and a maximum amount in our initial offer.

roadmap.body.sp.description.value: Development of the Stake pool infrastructure, with minimun of 2 nodes relays and 1 node core.

roadmap.body.te.description.value: The Trade feature is a way of users get other Native tokens and future migrated tokens to Cardano Blockchain.

children.value: Users will be able to Buy/Sell assets.

roadmap.body.ti.description.value: The Token Issue is when we release our Native Token, and integrate with the wallet and our DeFi services.

children.value: Issue our Utility token to serve as rewards and use in specific DeFi features that we’re going to develop.

roadmap.body.ts.description.value: The Token Swap feature is a way to users swap ADA and Native tokens.

children.value: Users will be able to Swap assets in the Cardano Blockchain.
Users can provide liquidity to Contract Pools Pairs.

roadmap.body.wallet.description.value: Fully feature Cardano wallet, that is the core feature of B58 Finance - DeFi platform. Our aim is to bring the best user experience for Blockchain users.

children.value: Multi Account Management
Send/Receive Tokens (ADA/Native Tokens)
Savings using Cardano Staking Pools, first at our own Pools
Voting integration with Project Catalyst Funds.

roadmap.body.wallet.more.value: This stage includes the development of a Browser Extension, with web3 like integration.And also a mobile Application for Android and iOS platform.

roadmap.title.value: Our Roadmap to the future of finance

team.body.value: Our Team is building to use ourselves, which result in a high-quality product for you to use as well.
We're committed to delivering the best in software development bringing a vast background from Enterprise Software, Cloud Engineer and Cyber Security.

team.description.flavio.value: 20 years of experience in Backend Development specialized in developing Enterprise tools and integrations in SAP ecosystem, focused on Supply Chain, Manufacturing and Financial. As a consultant have worked with multinational companies and automakers such as Fiat and Chrysler.

team.description.francis.value: 20 years of experience in Software Development, working with a variety of languages. And being part of projects in South America as consultant, living and helping to develop the Social Security System of Angola Africa, and working as a Cyber Security Engineer at a Global Bank.

team.description.gabriel.value: 11 years of experience in Software Development and Mobile specialist delivering cross-platform solutions, working developing custom ERP Systems for the Brazilian Market, and currently developing a iOS and Android Mobile solution for Health Insurance companies in the USA.

team.title.value: We are the Team that is building it for you

wallet.body.value: Our wallet is fully featured where

children.value: Cardano ADA

wallet.body.value: is our main currency but also allows you to transact native tokens available in the platform.
You're able to receive payments through our personalized

children.value: Card QR

wallet.body.value: that allows you to express yourself by the selection of themes available.
We also provide a Savings account ready and easy to use, where you earn rewards and can claim them every 5 days or build your retirement plan with it.
One more thing that you will enjoy is our

children.value: NTF

wallet.title.value: A Wallet that is simple and easy to use
